author: Javier Paz
title: Artificial Intelligence/ML API
description: Apps for training AI & ML algorithms tend to be centralized, with no transparency. This can bring biased results as the algorithm learn

assessments.note: I think this proposal is unique. There no other similar and they solve an important challenge in the Robotic & AI Community. But the most important is that they attract a lot new users & developers to the Cardano Community due his Robot and development is Open Source.

The proposal offers a solution for the training of AI/ML which is based on blockchain. I am aware of the AI training bias and if this can be solved with the Cardano then it is a clear benefit and adresses the challenge. In addition, any AI related development on Cardano should be higly enouraged since it will have rapid growth in the near future (SingularityNET is already onboard).
The measuring metrics are a bit vague, with only estimated total world mcap. It could be beneficial to see how much of this market can be captured, or how many users are estimated.

The proponents state - "We will create a baseline API to our SDK that leverages the immutable ledger and transparency of the blockchain as a public tool for AI/ML developers to train their AI/ML programs and algorithms on a decentralized network for better transparency and elimination of bias." What does this mean? (Note I have a PhD in Robotics and have worked in research and commercially training deploying many AI/ML models.)
assessments.reply: This is an example about your question: EXAMPLE: Imagine a swarm of "Cop Robots" that patrol the streets greeting people and looking ( VISION ) for miss-behaviors. These robots could communicate (VOICE RECOGNITION or CLOUD COMPUTING ) over a blockchain and have action-triggers with smart-contracts. These could run when they spot one person hurting another, to have the system vote on the best strategy to approach the scene or to call for help. But to achieve this type of behavior, it is necessary that smart-contracts have improved security and are able to interact with information from outside the blockchain.

assessments.note: This is an excellent proposal from a dynamic team. They are generating great interest from the community. This concept they are proposing makes me think that developers will engage heartily with the project and that equals the challenge.
They presented a lot of experience during 10 years. For me is enough to trust them and capable to success the project.

The proposer is established but a still growing startup with a dedicated team and results. The videos, links and graphic clearly demonstrates the work done so far in the AI/ML space.
The funding will be used to form a new team which shall implement the connection to the blockchain. The breakdown shows the estimated working hours clearly, but might be lacking on other potential resources.
Added benefit is a free sample of a couple of robots to be tested by the Cardano community, added after a nice suggestion from community member which made into actual proposal.
The proposal did not specifically mention potential risks, and ways to mitigate them which might be beneficial to evaluate the overall feasibility.

I feel that the team has the necessary experience and plan to implement this proposal successfully. They seem well advanced in their own endeavours and have already produced quality. The problem being opened up to the community requires further research which is what this proposal is targeting.
It is likely for this proposal to be implemented because Qbo is an existing company and the Qbo team has extensive experience in AI and ML robotics.
I am an expert in Cyber Security and robotic and know perfectly what are they doing.

The proposal clearly states what is the goal (biased results of trained AI) and how to achieve it (blockchain-decentralised, trusted solution).
The best KPIs are tangible, and the team will send several robots to the Cardano community to evaluate the results. That will provide very clear evaluation results first-hand from the interested members. Can not wait to see posts about the performance.
It would be nice to have more info on the global impact estimates of this work, in example number of users and how these can be measured/monitored. More tangible results after the delivery.
There is not enough information on what they are actually trying to do and how it would work to be able to say it would be successful.
assessments.reply: Please read completely our proposal and you can see all we are doing right now. We have more than 10000 customers in 48 countries and we are making support for them every day. Right now we want to move forward with new techonologies that can use our customers soon.

assessments.note: Excellent information provided and certainly sufficient to assess but it is a little expert centric and may not be fathomable to entire community. I would like further breakdown of budget and simplified plan to improve the quality of this submission.
This project needs a detailed roadmap that outlines the project deliverable. Question: What are the milestones or steps to make this project a reality.
assessments.reply: You can see a detailed roadmap in our proposal.

solution: The immutable ledger and transparency of the public blockchain will provide the decentralised, trusted solution AI and ML desperately needs.
experience: Founded in 2008, Thecorpora Company has accumulated more than 10 years of experience in building **interactive** **robots**.
